696420.name: Padria Online
696420.description:
Experience true open-world freedom in Padria Online - Hardcore PVP massively multiplayer online role-playing game.

Choose from many different classes, decide whether to focus on PvP or PvE, both sharing the same world, no matter what in this full PVP game you will be entertained!
no matter your poison whether you combat, crafting, magic, trading, there is something for everyone.
Countless skills, resources and tools to master to old and control the lands.
There are no PvP zones, only a single open and realistic world where you are free to choose your own path and mold your own personal adventure.
Massive single world island for pvp and players to explore and fight.
Strength in numbers, group with your friends to conquer the world as a group.
Or play solo as a back stabbing melee that hides in the brush waiting for a simple trader to pass by.
With enough power, violence or diplomacy, you and your allies will be able to rule an entire nation, or fall to one!

Key Features:
Striking Semi-Realistic artwork
Our artwork was had drawn and painted, with the idea of immersion aspect you will never see dull environments and boring levels!

Conquer The World of Padria
Play through a campaign, of PVP content facing off against the minions of Padria as you fight for control.

Test Your Mettle
with the Kills ranking system you can fight other players to be the lord of Padria, become the king and gain special rewards!
696420.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
